summary: This is an email from attorney Thomas Moyer at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP to the SDNY, transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. It includes a cover letter, updated production index, and a secure link to download the documents.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: Attorney at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP who sent the email transmitting Deutsche Bank's document production to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

connections.description: Thomas Moyer is acting on behalf of Deutsche Bank, transmitting documents to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The SDNY issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, requesting documents.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production to SDNY
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its attorney Thomas Moyer, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in response to the July 11 subpoena.

locations: 2001 K Street N.W., Washington DC 20006 (Akin Gump office)
keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was complying with a subpoena from the SDNY dated July 11, 2019, by producing documents.
The document production was handled by attorney Thomas Moyer of the law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP.
The transmitted files included a cover letter, an updated production index, and a password-protected archive (DB-SDNY-Prod008.zip).
The email indicates an ongoing investigation by the SDNY involving Deutsche Bank's records, likely related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The secure file share link for the documents was set to expire on March 4, 2020.
